Title: Sisu

Synopsis: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, Nazi soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

Title: American Born Chinese

Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: The Mother

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Cast: Director:, Jalmari Helander, | ,     Stars:, Jorma Tommila, , Aksel Hennie, , Jack Doolan, , Mimosa Willamo

Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: The Flash

Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: The Covenant
Cast: Director:, Guy Ritchie, | ,     Stars:, Jake Gyllenhaal, , Dar Salim, , Sean Sagar, , Jason Wong
Synopsis: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: Sisu
Cast: Director:, Jalmari Helander, | ,     Stars:, Jorma Tommila, , Aksel Hennie, , Jack Doolan, , Mimosa Willamo
Synopsis: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, Nazi soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Title: The Rookie
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Alyssa Diaz, , Richard T. Jones, , Melissa O'Neil
Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Cast: Director:, Steven Caple Jr., | ,     Stars:, Anthony Ramos, , Dominique Fishback, , Luna Lauren Velez, , Dean Scott Vazquez
Synopsis: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

Title: The Mother

Synopsis: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins

Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Synopsis: Baltimore. New Year's Eve. A talented but troubled police officer (Shailene Woodley) is recruited by the FBI's chief investigator (Ben Mendelsohn) to help profile and track down a disturbed individual terrorizing the city.

Synopsis: Enforcing his own brand of justice, US Marshal Raylan, a strong-willed, quiet law-man haunted by his past, returns to his native town to see that justice is served to those in need.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: The Witcher
Cast: Stars:, Henry Cavill, , Freya Allan, , Anya Chalotra, , Mimi Ndiweni
Synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Joaquim Dos Santos, , Kemp Powers, , Justin K. Thompson, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Brian Tyree Henry, , Luna Lauren Velez
Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: FUBAR
Cast: Stars:, Arnold Schwarzenegger, , Monica Barbaro, , Milan Carter, , Gabriel Luna
Synopsis: A C.I.A. operative on the edge of retirement discovers a family secret and is called back into the field for one last job.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Cast: Director:, Chad Stahelski, | ,     Stars:, Keanu Reeves, , Laurence Fishburne, , George Georgiou, , Lance Reddick
Synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Fast X
Cast: Director:, Louis Leterrier, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jason Statham, , Jordana Brewster
Synopsis: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3

Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: Citadel
Cast: Stars:, Richard Madden, , Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Stanley Tucci, , Ashleigh Cummings
Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Hypnotic
Cast: Director:, Robert Rodriguez, | ,     Stars:, Ben Affleck, , Alice Braga, , JD Pardo, , Dayo Okeniyi
Synopsis: A detective investigates a mystery involving his missing daughter and a secret government program.

Title: Blood & Gold
Cast: Director:, Peter Thorwarth, | ,     Stars:, Robert Maaser, , Marie Hacke, , Jördis Triebel, , Alexander Scheer
Synopsis: At the end of World War II, a German soldier is looking for his daughter while an SS troop is looking for a Jewish treasure.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Game of Thrones
Cast: Stars:, Emilia Clarke, , Peter Dinklage, , Kit Harington, , Lena Headey
Synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
Cast: Director:, David F. Sandberg, | ,     Stars:, Zachary Levi, , Asher Angel, , Jack Dylan Grazer, , Rachel Zegler
Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: The Covenant
Cast: Director:, Guy Ritchie, | ,     Stars:, Jake Gyllenhaal, , Dar Salim, , Sean Sagar, , Jason Wong
Synopsis: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: Sisu
Cast: Director:, Jalmari Helander, | ,     Stars:, Jorma Tommila, , Aksel Hennie, , Jack Doolan, , Mimosa Willamo
Synopsis: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, Nazi soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

Title: American Born Chinese
Cast: Stars:, Ben Wang, , Yann Yann Yeo, , Chin Han, , Jimmy Liu
Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Title: The Rookie
Cast: Stars:, Nathan Fillion, , Alyssa Diaz, , Richard T. Jones, , Melissa O'Neil
Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
Cast: Director:, Steven Caple Jr., | ,     Stars:, Anthony Ramos, , Dominique Fishback, , Luna Lauren Velez, , Dean Scott Vazquez
Synopsis: During the '90s, a new faction of Transformers - the Maximals - join the Autobots as allies in the battle for Earth.

Title: The Mother
Cast: Director:, Niki Caro, | ,     Stars:, Jennifer Lopez, , Lucy Paez, , Omari Hardwick, , Joseph Fiennes
Synopsis: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins
Synopsis: Low-level FBI agent Peter Sutherland works in the basement of the White House manning a phone that never rings - until the night it does, propelling him into a conspiracy that leads all the way to the Oval Office.

Title: The Boys
Cast: Stars:, Karl Urban, , Jack Quaid, , Antony Starr, , Erin Moriarty
Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Cast: Stars:, Natsuki Hanae, , Zach Aguilar, , Akari Kitô, , Abby Trott
Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Chris Bartlett, , Katee Sackhoff, , Carl Weathers

Synopsis: Follows a locally born and bred S.W.A.T. sergeant and his team of highly-trained men and women as they solve crimes in Los Angeles.

Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.

Title: Sisu

Synopsis: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, Nazi soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

Title: American Born Chinese

Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: The Flash
Cast: Stars:, Grant Gustin, , Candice Patton, , Danielle Panabaker, , Carlos Valdes
Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: The Mother

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: The Night Agent
Cast: Stars:, Gabriel Basso, , Luciane Buchanan, , Fola Evans-Akingbola, , Sarah Desjardins

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Synopsis: A prequel to Star Trek: The Original Series, the show follows the crew of the USS Enterprise under Captain Christopher Pike.

Title: Avatar: The Way of Water

Synopsis: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

Title: Reacher
Cast: Stars:, Alan Ritchson, , Malcolm Goodwin, , Willa Fitzgerald, , Hugh Thompson
Synopsis: Jack Reacher was arrested for murder and now the police need his help. Based on the books by Lee Child.

Cast: Directors:, Scott Beck, , Bryan Woods, | ,     Stars:, Adam Driver, , Ariana Greenblatt, , Chloe Coleman, , Nika King
Synopsis: An astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet only to discover he's not alone.

Title: Justified
Cast: Stars:, Timothy Olyphant, , Nick Searcy, , Joelle Carter, , Jacob Pitts
Synopsis: Enforcing his own brand of justice, US Marshal Raylan, a strong-willed, quiet law-man haunted by his past, returns to his native town to see that justice is served to those in need.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Cast: Directors:, Daniel Kwan, , Daniel Scheinert, | ,     Stars:, Michelle Yeoh, , Stephanie Hsu, , Jamie Lee Curtis, , Ke Huy Quan
Synopsis: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure in which she alone can save existence by exploring other universes and connecting with the lives she could have led.

Title: House of the Dragon
Cast: Stars:, Matt Smith, , Graham McTavish, , Steve Toussaint, , Eve Best
Synopsis: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Vin Diesel, , Bradley Cooper, , Zoe Saldana
Synopsis: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

Title: The Witcher
Cast: Stars:, Henry Cavill, , Freya Allan, , Anya Chalotra, , Mimi Ndiweni
Synopsis: Geralt of Rivia, a solitary monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

Title: Ghosted
Cast: Director:, Dexter Fletcher, | ,     Stars:, Chris Evans, , Ana de Armas, , Adrien Brody, , Mike Moh
Synopsis: Cole falls head over heels for enigmatic Sadie, but then makes the shocking discovery that she's a secret agent. Before they can decide on a second date, Cole and Sadie are swept away on an international adventure to save the world.

Title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse

Synopsis: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

Title: FUBAR
Cast: Stars:, Arnold Schwarzenegger, , Monica Barbaro, , Milan Carter, , Gabriel Luna
Synopsis: A C.I.A. operative on the edge of retirement discovers a family secret and is called back into the field for one last job.

Title: Barry
Cast: Stars:, Bill Hader, , Stephen Root, , Sarah Goldberg, , Anthony Carrigan
Synopsis: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

Title: John Wick: Chapter 4
Cast: Director:, Chad Stahelski, | ,     Stars:, Keanu Reeves, , Laurence Fishburne, , George Georgiou, , Lance Reddick
Synopsis: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.

Title: Fast X
Cast: Director:, Louis Leterrier, | ,     Stars:, Vin Diesel, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Jason Statham, , Jordana Brewster
Synopsis: Dom Toretto and his family are targeted by the vengeful son of drug kingpin Hernan Reyes.

Title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
Cast: Director:, James Gunn, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pratt, , Chukwudi Iwuji, , Bradley Cooper, , Pom Klementieff
Synopsis: Still reeling from the loss of Gamora, Peter Quill rallies his team to defend the universe and one of their own - a mission that could mean the end of the Guardians if not successful.

Title: Dungeons & Dragons: Honor Among Thieves
Cast: Directors:, John Francis Daley, , Jonathan Goldstein, | ,     Stars:, Chris Pine, , Michelle Rodriguez, , Regé-Jean Page, , Justice Smith
Synopsis: A charming thief and a band of unlikely adventurers embark on an epic quest to retrieve a lost relic, but things go dangerously awry when they run afoul of the wrong people.

Title: Citadel
Cast: Stars:, Richard Madden, , Priyanka Chopra Jonas, , Stanley Tucci, , Ashleigh Cummings
Synopsis: Global spy agency Citadel has fallen, and its agents' memories were wiped clean. Now the powerful syndicate, Manticore, is rising in the void. Can the Citadel agents recollect their past and summon the strength to fight back?

Title: The Machine
Cast: Director:, Peter Atencio, | ,     Stars:, Bert Kreischer, , Mark Hamill, , Jimmy Tatro, , Iva Babic
Synopsis: Bert's drunken past catches up with him 20 years down the road when he and his father are kidnapped by those Bert wronged 20 years ago while drunk on a college semester abroad in Russia.

Title: Hypnotic
Cast: Director:, Robert Rodriguez, | ,     Stars:, Ben Affleck, , Alice Braga, , JD Pardo, , Dayo Okeniyi
Synopsis: A detective investigates a mystery involving his missing daughter and a secret government program.

Title: Blood & Gold
Cast: Director:, Peter Thorwarth, | ,     Stars:, Robert Maaser, , Marie Hacke, , Jördis Triebel, , Alexander Scheer
Synopsis: At the end of World War II, a German soldier is looking for his daughter while an SS troop is looking for a Jewish treasure.

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
Cast: Directors:, Bob Persichetti, , Peter Ramsey, , Rodney Rothman, | ,     Stars:, Shameik Moore, , Jake Johnson, , Hailee Steinfeld, , Mahershala Ali
Synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Game of Thrones
Cast: Stars:, Emilia Clarke, , Peter Dinklage, , Kit Harington, , Lena Headey
Synopsis: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

Title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods

Synopsis: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

Title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
Cast: Director:, Peyton Reed, | ,     Stars:, Paul Rudd, , Evangeline Lilly, , Michael Douglas, , Michelle Pfeiffer
Synopsis: Scott Lang and Hope Van Dyne are dragged into the Quantum Realm, along with Hope's parents and Scott's daughter Cassie. Together they must find a way to escape, but what secrets is Hope's mother hiding? And who is the mysterious Kang?

Title: The Covenant
Cast: Director:, Guy Ritchie, | ,     Stars:, Jake Gyllenhaal, , Dar Salim, , Sean Sagar, , Jason Wong
Synopsis: During the war in Afghanistan, a local interpreter risks his own life to carry an injured sergeant across miles of grueling terrain.

Title: Sisu
Cast: Director:, Jalmari Helander, | ,     Stars:, Jorma Tommila, , Aksel Hennie, , Jack Doolan, , Mimosa Willamo
Synopsis: When an ex-soldier who discovers gold in the Lapland wilderness tries to take the loot into the city, Nazi soldiers led by a brutal SS officer battle him.

Title: American Born Chinese

Synopsis: Jin Wang is an average teenager balancing high school and home life. When he meets a new foreign student on the first day of the school, even more worlds collide as Jin is unwittingly entangled in a battle with Chinese mythological gods.

Title: The Flash

Synopsis: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes up from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed, becoming the Flash, and fighting crime in Central City.

Synopsis: Starting over isn't easy, especially for John Nolan who, after a life-altering incident, is pursuing his dream of joining the LAPD. As their oldest rookie, he's met with skepticism from those who see him as just a walking midlife crisis.

Title: The Mother

Synopsis: While fleeing from dangerous assailants, an assassin comes out of hiding to protect the daughter she left earlier in life.

Title: The Last of Us
Cast: Stars:, Pedro Pascal, , Bella Ramsey, , Anna Torv, , Lamar Johnson
Synopsis: After a global pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope.

Title: The Boys

Synopsis: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

Synopsis: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.

Synopsis: Up-and-coming CIA analyst, Jack Ryan, is thrust into dangerous field assignments.
